Place Geometry

type: object

Field Required Type Description
close optional PlaceOpeningHoursPeriodDetail May contain a pair of day and time objects describing when the place closes. If a place is always open, the close section will be missing from the response. Clients can rely on always-open being represented as an open period containing day with value 0 and time with value 0000, and no close. See PlaceOpeningHoursPeriodDetail for more information.
open optional PlaceOpeningHoursPeriodDetail Contains a pair of day and time objects describing when the place opens. See PlaceOpeningHoursPeriodDetail for more information.
